model

类 Continent

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Continent

  • public class Continent
extends java.lang.Object
    Define class of a continent The following is only base code, further features need to be added

      • Continent

        public Continent(java.lang.String name,
                 int controlVal)
        Constructor of Continent
        参数:
        name - The name of new continent
        controlVal - Additional number of armies given to players when he hold the whole continent

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Assert if the continent has no country associated with it
        返回:
        true-no country belongs to this continent, otherwise false

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Continent c)
        verify if two continent is same continent
        参数:
        c - continent need to be compare
        返回:
        true same continent, false different continent
